**measurements**
circumference: 77 (85, 90, 98, 104, 112) cm / 30.3 (33.5, 35.4, 38.6, 40.9, 44.1) inches
length: 44 (46, 48, 50, 54, 58) cm / 17.3 (18.1, 18.9, 19.7, 21.3, 22.8) inches

**pattern information**
lotus is a soft and light raglan blouse with i-cord edges worked from the top down using 2 strands of friends kid silk held together.

the lotus blouse has a negative ease of approx. 5 cm/ 2 inches. if you prefer a looser fit, choose a size matching your actual chest circumference.

the pattern is showing 2 different color combinations:
friends kid silk col. pale matcha (107) and col. olive (109).
friends kid silk col. dusty mauve (58) and col. cream (04).

**materials**
3 (3, 3, 4, 4, 5) skeins of friends kid silk col. pale matcha (107)
3 (3, 3, 4, 4, 5) skeins of friends kid silk col. olive (109)


circular needles 6 mm, 80 cm, and 40 cm
circular needles 5 mm, 80 cm, and 40 cm

**yarn quality**
friends kid silk, hobbii
72% kid mohair, 3% wool, 25% silk
25 g (0.9 oz) = 200 m (218 yds)

**gauge**
10 x 10 cm / 4” x 4” = 15 sts x 21 rows
